}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== h"8WPCG06..4A1G" is silkscreened on at least some boards. "1WPCG06...A2G" is printed on a label affixed to the board.
All revisions of the WDA-1320 are assumed to use the same subsystem.
